evidence.text: NAI NAI: [Ai-ya. My son would never let this happen if he were here.]

NAI NAI: [Ai-ya. You really are an incompetent mother.]
NAI NAI: [No wonder my son doesn’t want to be home.]

NAI NAI: [ME? BURDEN? All I offer to do is help because clearly you can’t handle it. And if my son weren’t out there working, making money, this family would have nothing and we would all be homeless.]

NAI NAI: [Nai Nai is so old. How many years do I have left?...I won’t even be here to see you finish high school.]
CHUNGSING: [Nai Nai. Lie down.] [Kids, it’s fine. You can leave. Let Nai Nai rest.]
